scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve"
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"
